# templates

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Brad Cannell's templates and themes

## Installation

You can install templates from GitHub with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("brad-cannell/templates")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(templates)
## basic example code
```
